author: timbeiko
content: Any oppositions to renaming this channel to #attack-vectors so that it can be used to discuss a broad set of risks to the protocol (e.g. the MEV conversations from last week)?

author: timbeiko
content: Changed! Also, <@!301186049323958275> you had a question about opening a proper MEV channel last week. After discussing with mods, we agreed that this channel can probably contain most of it, and if people get too "in the weeds" re: MEV, we can just point them to the flashbots discord üôÇ

author: sky.cactus
content: To be clear, I wasn't advocating for a new channel for it, just "somewhere consistent to point people".

author: timbeiko
content: Yep! This is the place üôÇ "Lite MEV" -> here, "In the weeds MEV" -> Flashbots üôÇ
